name: GiftOasis
tag_list: unique-gifts, gifts, crafts, north-carolina, social-entrepreneurship, start-up, small-businesses, economic-development, art
overview:
GiftOasis is an online marketplace that was designed to provide an easy shopping experience to customers seeking unique, high-quality gift items. We partner with small artisan businesses and give them a place to share their products, which may otherwise not get the audience they deserve.

The GiftOasis marketplace is made up of talented artisans from North Carolina. Our marketplace creates an environment that allows for a smooth, easy shopping experience. The site is set up so that each seller can post his or her own products and descriptions and handle the shipping of their products to you.

We allow you to browse items based on their type, like jewelry or home goods, or the location in North Carolina in which they were made.In addition, you may also look up different artisans and search their individual pages on our site. There, you can learn more about the seller and the stories behind their work.
